full_method_info:
/**
 * Deactivates the tool. This method is called whenever the user
 * switches to another tool. Use this method to do some clean-up
 * when the tool is switched. Subclassers should always call
 * super.deactivate.
 */
public void deactivate();
method_comment:
* Deactivates the tool. This method is called whenever the user
     * switches to another tool. Use this method to do some clean-up
     * when the tool is switched. Subclassers should always call
     * super.deactivate.
